bites.bite: The largest adm_1 is Lagunes district with 103 reports followed by Moyen-Cavally district with 58 reports.
The largest adm_2 is Abidjan department with 148 reports followed by Duékoué department with 48 reports.
The largest adm_1 is Lagunes district with 103 reports followed by Moyen-Cavally district with 58 reports.
